alert.note: Alert for East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Goshen and east central Platte Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 433 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Grayrocks Reservoir, or 12 miles east of Wheatland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Laramie National Historic Site. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
